features.1: Added a configurations page to set second axis measurement and units.
features.2: Added functionality to enter second axis measurement during scans.
features.3: Added upload functionality for second axis measurement data to AWS.

bugfixes.1: Failed calibrations now properly force the user to retry.
bugfixes.2: Missing calibration files now properly force the user to calibrate.

bugfixes.1: Fixed issue with changes to pump priming speed not propagating when the setup screen is open.

features.2: Updated frequency range to be 70-120 MHz.
features.3: Added priming toggle to setup screen.
features.4: Update the pump controller to utilize En pin with permanent VDD connection.
features.5: Added ability to configure the pump priming flow rate via settings.
features.6: Added controls to keep the pump RPM within 0.1-600.

features.1: Added ability to manually configure time, date and timezone from the app.
features.2: Added configuration to update the default pump flow rate.

bugfixes.1: Fixed data export from run screen when signed out.
bugfixes.2: Fixed issue with progress bar disappearing early during scans, and not disappearing after scans error.
bugfixes.3: Pump now properly stops when a run is finished.

features.1: Updated text notifications to use better terminology.
features.2: Updated default flow rate to 5 mL/hr
features.3: Updated calibration range to be 100-160 MHz.
